name: Marble Run65
description:
MarbleRun 65 is an exciting game where you roll your marble through challenging and thrilling courses to reach the finish line. Similar to some other popular Marble games, MarbleRun 65 tests your skills with precision and timing as you collect diamonds and avoid obstacles.  Once completed it will have 65 levels to conquer, you'll have hours of fun and excitement ahead. Play MarbleRun 65 today and experience the ultimate marble racing game! 

NOTE: THIS IS A EARLY PROTOTYPE AND ONLY HAS 4 TRAINING LEVELS! IT ALSO HAS BUGS!  THE COLOURS/PALETTE/MUSIC ARE NOT RIGHT. THERE WILL BE 6 GRAPHICALLY DIFFERENT WORLDS WHEN COMPLETED.

Controls are Keyboard and Mouse.

Movement Keys: W A S D 

Jump: Space

In Game Options: TAB Key

Exit: ESC Key

Compatible with a Gamepad!
